author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> For those of you who are interested, the Ethereum Open Communities L2 Standards WG just released a paper on the usage of existing identity standards and tooling with regard to a cross-chain L2 keystone. Feedback is welcome:
https://entethalliance.org/w3cs-did-and-vc-technology-can-help-with-ethereums-three-transitions/
